title: Even chance
creator_credit: Martin Zierman, Sabina Baltrukomis, Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Ed and Victoria. Office of the Commissioner for Equal Opportunity
brief_description: Alice, a young Aboriginal woman, leaves her home in a country town to work in the city. She finds employment but things start to go wrong and eventually she is dismissed. Alice decides to take her case to the Office of the Commissioner for Equal Opportunity. The program highlights examples of harassment, prejudice, stereotyping and discrimination.
